desc.en: Large territorial herbivores, the Triceratops have caused some problems to the Eversight expedition, but nothing that couldn't be handled by the experienced members. They live in family groups with a dominant male, or “bull” as the leader.

appr.en: An adult triceratops averages about thirty feet in length, ten feet in height and weighs roughly thirteen tons. Their most prominent feature are their large skulls with three very sharp horns. Their hides are mottled yellow-brown and green, denoting their gender. The hides are also very tough and resilient.

hist.en: Thought to be long extinct, the Eversight expedition discovered them thriving in the land they call Juratania. Many hours have been spent studying the family groupings of these creatures. It was also discovered that their horns and hides are very useful for various crafts.
